name: ShowerSounds
0:
”Alexa open shower sounds”
”Alexa ask shower sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: shower sounds
des: Introducing Shower Sounds — your splash of melody for every day! Transform your day into a rejuvenating escape. Enjoy high-quality audio that creates the perfect shower ambiance. Experience seamless streaming with no interruptions, just pure melodic bliss. Rain or shine, Shower Sounds keeps your spirits high with the perfect backdrop. Get ready to lather up and lose yourself.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
